LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.label: Basic gene sequence acquisition
LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. You can unlock the basic technology of the insect group and hatch basic auxiliary insects and weapon organs. The blueprints of all technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.label: Node WMT-1 "Breakthrough"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Empress and craft species can be evolved to the next stage. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.label: Node WMT-2 "Breakthrough 2"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Empress and craft species can be evolved to the next stage. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.label: Node VXI-6 "Acid Sac"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Insects with acid sacs are able to spray strong acids to repel enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.label: Node VXI-7 "External Acid Bag"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species will be able to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.label: Node VXI-8 "Large Acid Gland"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species will be able to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.label: Node VXI-9 "Acid Rain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species will be able to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.label: Node VXI-10 "Small Disaster"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species will be able to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.label: Node VXI-11 "Disaster"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. You will now be able to build a Disaster Acid Cannon organization, a powerful defensive structure that can not only repel hordes of enemies, but also launch attacks across the map.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.label: Node THD-1 "Psychic Lightning"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The Hive Antenna evolutionary path is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species will be able to hatch new psychic lightning-based weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.label: Node HAG-2 "Hatchling Pond"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.description: Arachnidae - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for their biological superiority. Arachnidae will be able to construct a series of incubation pond-related structures to hatch new insect families.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.label: Node KYC-1 "Warrior Bug"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species can hatch a new Insect race--Warrior species. The blueprints for all of the Arachne Insects' technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.label: Node KYC-4 "Protozoa"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species can hatch a new insect race - a protozoan species. It is a special insect that parasitizes and controls other races. The blueprints for all the technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.label: Node KYC-2 "Flight Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species can hatch a new Insect Race - the Sky Race. An agile and deadly elite Insect race that has the ability to crisscross the battlefield in flight. The blueprints for all of the Arachne Insects' technologies can only be researched through genetic experimental eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.label: Node KYC-5 "Giant Armor"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Empress species can hatch a new insect race - the Stray Mist species. They are large insects with thick shells that support mass attacks using smoke screens, flame retardants, and insect swarm reinforcement information elements. The blueprints for all of the Arachne insect swarm's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.label: Node KYC-6 "Spiritual Brain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species can hatch a new Insect race, the Origen species. They have long lifespans and strong mental abilities, and can support insect group research and perform powerful magic. The blueprints for all the techniques of the Arachne Insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.label: Node KYC-7 "Guardian"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. The Empress species is a new insect Tribe - Can hatch forbidden species. It has a longer lifespan than other insect tribes, has excellent long-range combat ability and social ability, and can also lead the insect swarm as a commander. The blueprints of all the technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.label: Node MEN-6 "pseudoline"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species hatches a new insect group - pseudonematodes. This is a group of insects parasitized by the Arachne Pseudoline from birth, making them disposable infantry that can be produced cheaply and quickly. However, they lack control and cannot be expected to be disciplined. The blueprints for all of the Arachne insect group's technologies can only be researched through genetic experimental eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.label: Node DIL-4 "Beginner Textile"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.label: Node DIL-5 "Intermediate Textile"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.label: Node DIL-6 "High quality fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.label: Node PAV-5 "Poison Needle"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons, and some insect groups with venomous stingers can also shoot poisonous stingers.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.label: Node PAV-6 "Tempest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.label: Node PAV-7 "Blood Needle"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7XPAV.label: Node PAV-7X "Sloth"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7XPAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.label: Node PAV-8 "Gigabit Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the fundamental evolutionary path common to all Insects groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of Insects. It allows the Insects to build strong defensive facilities. It has strong armor penetration and high rate of fire, providing excellent performance against heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.label: Node MEL-2 "Rage Whip"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.label: Node MEL-3 "Cystaron"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.label: Node ESS-5 "Essence Extraction"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Enable the Arachne insect swarm to build special biological structures and generate essence by placing prisoners in them. At the same time, construct Arachne genetic experimental eggs and develop special colony technology.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.label: Node POD-8 "Air Sac Type"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. . Allows the Insects to build special auxiliary insects. These insects can be used to move items and insects to other locations on the world map without using fuel.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.label: Node NPT-1 "Central Tower"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The Hive Antenna evolutionary path is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables the insect group to build a central feeding facility, which automatically replenishes structures that require linked nutrients.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.label: Node SHL-5 "Photoane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary pathway of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to construct specialized fungi that can provide a direct light source to promote plant growth.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.label: Node SHL-6 "Temperature Control"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to construct specialized fixed insects that can control the temperature of a room.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.label: Node TUN-1 "Mine Type"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect groups. It allows the insect people to build special fixed insects that can connect two points by digging roads and quickly transport people and supplies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.label: Node GUT-6 "Catalyst"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It enables insect groups to utilize the catalytic ability of biological giant bacteria to construct various production architectures.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.label: Node NPT-2 "Dormant Cocoon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for their biological superiority. Insects are now able to construct cocoons to house surplus insects, where they sleep until the will of the colony calls them back.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.label: Node NPT-3 "Honey Crystal"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Allows the Insect tribe to construct burrows that produce Arachne honey cake. Insect nectar is broken down to create edible honey scum. This in-hive processed food helps the Insect tribe survive the effects of cold-blooded animals and has a soft texture that even non-Insect settlers can enjoy.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4NPT.label: Node NPT-4 "Hatchling Pond"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4NPT.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it is the biological superiority of the insect group. We are laying the foundation. Enables the Insects to build hatching ponds.It is an incubation facility that specializes in the mass production of Insects.Hatching ponds hatch with higher efficiency than hatching cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.label: Node CPE-8 "Crop"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary pathway of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to grow food crops on the creep.It relies on the creep and soil nutrients to grow and helps provide biomass for the burrow.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.label: Node CPE-9 "Bee Spike Shooter"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to grow specialized crops on the creep. When it grows up, it becomes an aggressive fungus colony that fires poisonous stingers at enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.label: Node SPV-6 "Insect nest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It allows craft species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.label: Node SPV-7 "Explosive Projection"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to build powerful defense facilities. It projects explosive seed insects with a suicidal attack on invading enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.label: Node MED-2 "erosive parasitism"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.description: Arachnoid group - hive antennae The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It allows the honeycan species to use the parasitic ability of pseudoarachnoid species and releases the production of pseudoarachnoid inhibitors in medical cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.label: Node STL-5 "Gene Stealing"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Warrior species undergo directional evolution, giving up their combat skills in exchange for skills in extracting and injecting genes from colonists, prisoners, and slaves. The blueprints for all Arachnidae technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.label: Node VTE-1 "Guardian"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Shieldheads undergo directional evolution, giving up their chitin production and building abilities, in exchange for combat, movement, and collision attack skills. The blueprints for all of the Arachnidae's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.label: Node MED-1 "Healing Seed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The honeycan species undergoes directional evolution, and in exchange for giving up the ability to produce nectar, it strengthens its own medical ability and releases the skill of hatching medical cocoons. The blueprints of all technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.label: Node CLO-4 "Tracking Species"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Warrior species undergo directional evolution, giving up the ability to use long-range weapons, in exchange for powerful melee combat capabilities and permanent stealth. The blueprints for all Arachne Bug technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.label: Node BAC-1 "Bacterial Seed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Stray Mist species undergoes directional evolution, giving up its defense power and ability to emit information elements, and instead produces the superior resource ``active giant bacteria'' required by the insect swarm. The blueprints of all technologies of the Arachne insect swarm can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.label: Node WID-9 "Magnetoviolent"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Aerial species undergo directional evolution and become highly advanced. In exchange for giving up the ability of fast flight and high-altitude maneuvers, it gains the ability to hurl large numbers of magneto-violent species at its enemies. The insect swarm can release EMP in the form of suicide bomb attacks and fight against mechanoids. The blueprints for all of the Arachne insect swarm's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6LOD.label: Node LOD-6 "Lord of the Nest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6LOD.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Aerial Species undergo directional evolution, giving up their high-speed movement and high-altitude maneuvering abilities, in exchange for which they can project large amounts of the Aerial Species to their enemies. The blueprints for all of the Arachne Bug Group's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.label: Node CON-3 "Builder"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The shieldhead species undergoes directional evolution, giving up its defense abilities in exchange for stronger chitin production and building abilities. The blueprints for all of the Arachnidae's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.label: Node FEL-8 "Deflagration Cavity"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The honeycan species undergoes directional evolution, giving up the ability to produce nectar in exchange for enhanced defenses, compound fuel production, and flame-throwing abilities. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.label: Node CRP-3 "Creep laying"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Mission The mist species undergoes directional evolution, giving up its pheromone-spraying ability in exchange for increased defense and movement speed, as well as the ability to deploy creep on a large scale. The blueprints for all of Arachne Bug's technologies can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.label: Node NAV-9 "Regional Navigation Envoy"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. By performing directed evolution on the Forbidden Species, they give up their direct combat ability and the ability to command the ground swarm, but instead gain the ability to command the aerial insect swarm. The blueprints for all the technologies of the Arachne insect swarm can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.label: Node EVO-1 "Beginner Evolution"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.description: Arachnidium - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Enables a new Arachnid evolutionary surgery, which strengthens the nutrient storage capacity and carapace of the Arachneid group.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.label: Node EVO-3 "Gliding Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.description: Arachne bugs - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the bug group. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery: implanting gliding wing membranes on the legs of Arachne bugs, increasing the speed of movement on creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.label: Node EVO-4 "Explosive Decocoon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables new Arachne evolutionary surgeries. It allows the Arachne Insects to decocoon and use explosive species for suicidal attacks.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.label: Node EVO-5 "Reactive Shell"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.description: Arachne Bug Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Enables a new Arachne Evolution Surgery.You can implant a reactive shell that prevents arbitrary damage on the Arachne Bug Group once.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.label: Node EVO-6 "Reinforced tendon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Insects to be implanted with tendons that aid in their jumping ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7EVO.label: Node EVO-7 "Carapace Spines"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in all insect groups and forms the basis of the insect group's biological superiority. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery.You can implant the Arachne Insects with spinous tubes that automatically attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.label: Node EVO-8 "Plastel Shell"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect groups. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery. Plasteel can be implanted into the shells of Arachne insects to give them high defense power.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.label: Node EVO-9 "Physiological Suppression"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.description: Arachne Bugs - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It allows for a new Arachne evolutionary surgery.Arachne bugs lose their self-healing ability, but are freed from lifespan limitations.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.label: Node EVO-10 "Advanced Lung"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.description: Arachnidium - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Enables a new Arachnid evolutionary surgery, which allows the Arachnoid group to obtain more powerful lungs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.label: Node SYM-2 "Frost Body"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Arachne insect group has a special biological architecture - Arachne Allows the construction of biomuscles, which can be fused with the insects to form an unconscious tissue, giving the insects powerful fighting power. The frost condensation symbiotic muscles allow the fused Arachne insects to use a wide variety of rapid-cooling armaments, allowing them to switch between large group control and rapid annihilation of high-value targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8SLA.label: Node SLA-8 "Beast of Violence"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8SLA.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. . Enables the hatching of new beast bugs by the Empress species - slaughter species. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne bug group can only be researched through genetic experiment eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.label: Node COV-4 "Heavenly Beast Group"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Allows the Arachne Bug Tribe to construct a special biological architecture - the Heavenly Shrine Beast Bug.This is a semi-autonomous individual commanded by the Towing Race, which can flexibly attack the enemy from the sky according to commands and rain down death.
